Information.title: Widgets move to free space on others pages after changing the desktop grid from 4x6 to 5x6
Information.environment: 1) Xiaomi Redmi Note 7, Android 10, QKQ1.190910.002, MIUI global 12.5.1 (and 12.5.3)
Information.precondition: 1) Desktop grid is 4x6; 2) There are 2 pages: № 1 with any number of apps with free space, № 2 with the app “AndroidGridTest”
Information.STR: 1) Add a widget (widget size by default); 2) Change a desktop grid from 4x6 to 5x6
Information.AR: widget moves to page № 1 from page № 2
Information.comment: the setting “fill empty cells” doesn’t affect on this case
